channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- HornetQ/Artemis
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- HornetQ/Artemis

item.title: CVE-2017-12174|2024-08-05T18:28:16.599Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- hornetq%2Fartemis
item.description: It was found that when Artemis and HornetQ before 2.4.0 are configured with UDP discovery and JGroups discovery a huge byte array is created when receiving an unexpected multicast message. This may result in a heap memory exhaustion, full GC, or OutOfMemoryError.
